solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int findUnsortedSubarray(int[] A) {--newline--        int n = A.length, beg = -1, end = -2, min = A[n-1], max = A[0];--newline--        for (int i=1;i<n;i++) {--newline--          max = Math.max(max, A[i]);--newline--          min = Math.min(min, A[n-1-i]);--newline--          if (A[i] < max) end = i;--newline--          if (A[n-1-i] > min) beg = n-1-i; --newline--        }--newline--        return end - beg + 1;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
